ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF( AND(
ISPICKVAL( Courier1__Trigger_Interval__c, "Monthly") ,
OR( ISPICKVAL( Courier1__Trigger_Run_Day__c, "the 1st ...") , ISPICKVAL( Courier1__Trigger_Run_Day__c, "the 2nd ..."), ISPICKVAL( Courier1__Trigger_Run_Day__c, "the 3rd ..."), ISPICKVAL( Courier1__Trigger_Run_Day__c, "the 4th ..."), ISPICKVAL( Courier1__Trigger_Run_Day__c, "the last ...")) ,
ISPICKVAL( Courier1__Monthly_Day_of_the_Week__c , "" )), True , False )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For the interval chosen, you must also choose a Monthly Day of the Week.
